details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.7.3 Document Information Dictionary - Author and dc:creator
details.description: The value of Author entry from the document information dictionary, if present, and its analogous XMP property dc:creator shall be equivalent. dc:creator shall contain exactly one entry

rule.description: The value of Author entry from the document information dictionary, if present, and its analogous XMP property dc:creator shall be equivalent. dc:creator shall contain exactly one entry

error.message: The value of Author entry from the document Info dictionary and its matching XMP property dc:creator are not equivalent (Info /Author = %1, XMP dc:creator = %2)
